Don't have Netflix here in Denmark
Film1 is the only streaming video rental here in .nl

So here its a choice, do you want to first wait 1 month for the movie release in our local cinimas or wait 3 months and by it for 45$ or pirate the movies. For 0$ and actually get it at the same time as in other places
